 Recent Professional Accomplishments

After a rigorous selection process, I was one of the 21 professionals selected (out of the 120
professionals who applied) by the German Federal Ministry for Economic Affairs and Energy and
FICCI for IGMTP 2017.
• IGMTP is an element of the Foreign Economic Policy of the German Federal Ministry for
Economic Affairs and Energy (BMWi) towards India.
• The primary objective of the programme is "Initiating and strengthening of business
relations between German and Indian companies".

2. Ukrainian Ministerial Delegation, New Delhi & Mumbai, September 2017
•

•

A high-level Trade Delegation from Ukraine led by the Deputy Minister of Agrarian Policy
and Food and Deputy Minister of Economic Development and Trade visited India in
September 2017.
I was the Lead representative from my company responsible for organizing and managing
B2B meetings with Indian companies to explore potential synergies between India and
Ukraine. A detailed briefing note covering key insights of the Indian agricultural sector was
prepared by me, which was presented to the client along with detailed profiles of the Indian
companies.

3. Swiss Presidential Delegation, New Delhi, August 2017
•

•

The President of Switzerland visited India in August 2017 & was accompanied by a high level
delegation of government officials and business leaders. I was involved in preparing sectoral
briefings and a detailed presentation on the railways sector particularly identifying long term
business prospects for Swiss companies in India. The findings were presented to the
president and the participating delegation.
I also attended the networking event organised by Swiss Government to foster trade
development between India and Switzerland and interacted with the senior government
officials and members of the business delegation.

government officials. I was responsible for arranging high level B2B meetings of Indian
bureaucrats with the Finnish delegation. The delegation focus was on telecom and energy sector in

The objective of the research study was to analyse and assess business opportunities for Swiss
companies in the Indian Renewable Energy sector, especially solar energy sector and to identify
government projects in the Indian solar ecosystem wherein the foreign companies can supply
their products
2. Corporate Social Responsibility
The objective of the research study was to identify suitable opportunities for Swiss companies
to participate in the social development sector in India. A detailed primary research was also
conducted to initiate dialogue with CSR Heads of the top companies in India to gauge their
interest to engage Swiss socially driven companies in India, as a next step of the assessment
study.

The objective of the study was to understand potential for a leading UK based chemical
company that supplies specialty chemicals to the Defense sector, Gas Processing and Marine

growth drivers as well as procurement policy.

Grundfos GO Remote gives you intuitive handheld pump control. Save valuable time on pump control, data collection
and reporting with the most comprehensive mobile platform on the market. Grundfos GO Remote works with all our Epumps and communicates both using both radio and infra-red technology. It provides easy-to-follow tips and guidance
